title: Issues with Geforce Experience
body:
Every time I try to open League with GFE it gives me that PVP.net patcher Kernal has stopped working error, I've spoken to Nvidia but they can't seem to figure out. It was working a little more than a month ago and since then it hasn't been working, finally getting around to try to fix it. Anyone else experiencing this or know any fixes? 

I can still play league without opening it through GFE so that's why I'm just now getting around to it, figure my stuff SHOULD work correctly, right? HAA

replies.body: This specific error usually happens with a strict security setting, not necessarily your video card.  You'll want to run through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that your OS or any antivirus is allowing your game files to be accessed.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Would there be a reason why it just stopped working? The permissions are set.
Has the issue been resolved through the guide?  An OS or antivirus update can certainly do this and block game files from being accessed.  Anything that might have changed your settings around!
Also I reinstalled and now it is giving me that error from trying to open it through GFE and through the regular client.
